item.title: Web Scraping by R
item.description: Real Estate data (rental property) In this introduction, I will explain how to use Rselenium and rvest to collect real estate data.

item.title: Cover letter automation
item.description: In this introduction, I will explain how to partially automate your cover letter by R.
